contents.text: Welcome to The League, San Francisco’s premier selective dating app matching you with like-minded singles.
If you are an existing League member, press 1.
To update your profile or preferences, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you to a team member who will help you update your profile.

navigationGoals: Edit my profile details and update my preferences
I need to update my profile to highlight my military background and adjust my match preferences.
I need to recalibrate my profile metadata and tweak my preference algorithms.
I need help updating my dating profile and preferences
I need to update my profile to reflect my new research focus in quantum mechanics and swap my profile picture.

contents.text: To review your current matches and messages, press 2.
One moment please—we’ll connect you with support for your matches.

navigationGoals: Review my active matches and view unread messages
I want to review my current matches and catch up on any new messages.
I’d like to fetch my active match roster and manage my message threads.
I want to review my current matches and read my messages
I want to review my active matches and read their messages.

contents.text: If you are new to The League or want to become a member, press 2.
For information on membership plans and pricing, press 1.
Thank you—please hold while we connect you to someone who can discuss membership options.

navigationGoals: Get details on membership tiers and pricing
I’m interested in learning about The League’s membership plans and pricing options.
I want the breakdown of your subscription tiers, pricing models, and billing options.
I’d like information on membership pricing to join
I'm interested in membership pricing and whether there's a student discount for physics majors.

contents.text: For an overview of app features and the matchmaking process, press 2.
Hang tight—we’re connecting you with a specialist to explain how The League matches you.

navigationGoals: Understand how The League’s matchmaking process and features work
I’d like an overview of the app features and how the matchmaking process works.
Can you walk me through your matchmaking algorithm, compatibility scoring, and core app features?
I’d like someone to explain how the app matches me with other singles
I'd like an overview of the app’s matchmaking process and key features.
